metadata.title: CVE-2024-23793 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: The file upload feature in OTRS and ((OTRS)) Community Edition has a pathtraversal vulnerability. This issue permits authenticated agents orcustomer users to upload potentially harmful files to directoriesaccessible by the web server, potentially leading to the execution of localcode like Perl scripts.This issue affects OTRS: from 7.0.X through 7.0.49, 8.0.X, 2023.X, from2024.X through 2024.3.2; ((OTRS)) Community Edition: from 6.0.1 through6.0.34.

criterions.comment: znuny package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
